sentences.sContent: The fire engines were just pulling up, sirens blaring.
sentences.sCn: 救火车刚刚停下，警笛声还在尖利地响着。

sentences.sContent: Music blared from the apartment behind me.
sentences.sCn: 音乐声响亮刺耳，从我身后的房间传了出来。

remMethod.val: 和bleat(n. 羊的叫声)来自同一词源

trans.tranOther: If something such as a siren or radio blares, it makes a loud, unpleasant noise
